metadata.name: Boring Spawn Chunks
metadata.description: Backports the "spawnChunkRadius" game rule from Minecraft 1.20.5 alongside its new looks and default.

breaks.reason: This is The Original Deal! This hecker did configurable spawn chunks before Minecraft did! This mod's dev works for Mojang now! /carpet spawnChunksSize! Use it! It is perhaps safer for you to remove this mod and use what Carpet already has.
You are already using a spawn chunk nuke mod! This mod is gonna conflict with it! Either remove That Nuke or remove This Capable-Of-Being-A-Nuke!
